metadata.title: CVE-2020-16154 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The App::cpanminus package 1.7044 for Perl allows Signature VerificationBypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cpanminus - 1.7045-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cpanminus package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7045-1').
